lines.author: Guest
lines.text: Merry Christmas Clara! Yes, very much so!

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: (Is it... her breath? What did she eat!?)

lines.author: Guest
lines.text: Have you tried the garlic bread? What about the onion soup?

lines.author: Guest
lines.text: Oh, and the cheese crackers are to diiee for!

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: (Yes, I'm about to die with your breath lady!)

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: Yes? Ah! Hahaha, no I haven't tried any of those yet! See you!

lines.author: Clara
lines.text: (Let's get out of here as fast as we can!)
